Audio.Locality: El canon del Rio Claro, Antioquia
Audio.Author: Herman van Oosten
Audio.Comments: Bird not seen, i.d. not completely certain. Should not be any Chamaeza in Central Andes. Could well be, according to N. Krabbe, a new subspecies of campanisona or even a new species! I don't think I will have the means to go there again soon to get more information, please, if you're out there think of it, publish it and above all, safe it from extinction!
